attributes.action: The government needs to support the RSPCA!
attributes.additional_details: The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) is a charity that helps millions of animals each year, and needs government support! Enough of giving away billions to foreign countries when charities like the RSPCA are in dyer need to protect animals across the country from negligence! This is our country, we need to support our charities that start at home! protecting these animals should be a fundamental aspect that the government should take into consideration and pump money to help protect those animals that are in need. Please help support this petition if you agree!
